summary: This module implements support for categorical data within Dask DataFrames. It provides an accessor that mirrors pandas' categorical interface, utilities to retrieve and aggregate category information across partitions, and functions to lazily compute and synchronize categories throughout a Dask computation graph.
business_intent: To enable scalable, lazy handling of categorical columns in distributed DataFrames, ensuring consistent category metadata across partitions and offering a pandasâ€‘compatible API for categorical operations in a Dask environment.
